- Dont'a Hightower moved like his old self, running with a mix of front-seven starters and backups.
- Heavy passing day favored the offense and starred ... Brian Hoyer, today's best QB.
- Hoyer went 11/13, Stidham 11/14 and Jones 6/8 in team drills.

* J. Love went 10-of-17 in team with two sacks and INT (dropped by WR Thompkins.

* Stokes covered like a blanket.
